thread.title: Jared Roberts Joins Gallaher as Alcoa Sales Manager

author: cnbc.com
title: Jared Roberts Joins Gallaher as Alcoa Sales Manager
text:
KNOXVILLE, Tenn., March 16, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Gallaher , the region's leading life safety and asset protection solutions provider, has hired Jared Roberts as Alcoa sales manager.
Roberts, a veteran in sales management and sales training, worked for a major telecom company before finding his way into the security industry in 2014.
"What drew me to Gallaher most was their core values, which really resonated with me," Roberts said. "It brings me joy and happiness to help someone reach their goals, and guide and support them. That commitment to serve is what makes Gallaher a special place to work. I look forward to being able to help solve the complex security problems our customers face and help improve our sales processes."
In his new role as sales manager at Gallaher, Roberts is responsible for helping focus and train the company's Alcoa sales team.
"Jared is a phenomenal addition to our team," said Breck Ellison, COO at Gallaher. "His passion to serve and his fearlessness as a leader to try new things and learn how to grow with his team is what makes him so valuable. We look forward to seeing him develop personally and professionally with us."
Gallaher is expanding employment opportunities as the company continues to grow in 2018. For more information about other positions available, visit www.gallahersafe.com/careers .
About Gallaher
Since 1973, Gallaher has helped clients and the communities they serve live safer and more enjoyable lives. As the region's leading life safety and asset protection solutions provider, Gallaher delivers the best in design, integration, installation and service for a variety of business needs. Gallaher serves a broad portfolio of markets including healthcare, commercial, education, industrial, multi-dwelling and the public sector. By building customer loyalty through a commitment to a superior client experience, while maintaining a set of core values and standards of excellence, Gallaher proudly boasts an unparalleled employee culture and loyal customer base.
For more information on how Gallaher can help your business make integrated technology solutions easier, visit http://www.gallahersafe.com/ or call 877-970-2471.
